title: Firewall Error after Champion Select
body:
Hello!

So i was playing LoL this afternoon with no issues, but tonight i'm getting the "Firewall" error after champion select.
i've spent the last 30 mins googling how to fix the issue, even turning off my firewall and resetting my router to no avail.

Any advice you would give so i could get back onto the field of justice sooner rather then later would be awesome, as this is quite frustrating... 

Cheers

replies.body: Some basic information about your setup would help us a lot. Things like your ISP and OS, in addition to the actual way you're connected, can help us help you.
